column1: ten largest private equity (PE) deals in Central and Eastern Europe (CEE)

innogy Grid Holding (IGH) (Czech Republic)- Allianz; Macquarie Group; British Columbia Investment Management

M7 Group operations in CEE/SEE (Czech Republic; Slovakia; Romania; Hungary)- Vivendi
Galleria shopping mall in St. Petersburg (Russia)- Mubadala Investment
